title: Militant Group Hezbollah Is on the Sidelines of the Israel-Hamas War. Here’s What to Know
description: A week after Hamas started a war with Israel, violence is rising between Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah on Lebanon's border.

title: Powerful Earthquake Hits West Afghanistan a Week After Quakes Killed Thousands In Same Region
description: An earthquake struck western Afghanistan on Sunday, a week after strong quakes killed thousands of people in the same province.

title: The World Must Know What Hamas Has Inflicted Upon Israel
description: It is necessary to understand that what happened in peaceful villages and kibbutz in southern Israel, embodies horrific acts of barbarism.

title: Gaza Hospitals Warn That Thousands Could Die Amid Looming Ground Offensive
description: Palestinians in the besieged coastal enclave have struggled to find food, water, and safety ahead of an expected Israeli ground offensive.

title: Biden Says U.S. Is ‘Working Like Hell’ to Find American Hostages In Gaza
description: "We’re going to do everything in our power to get them home," President Biden said of the missing American nationals.

title: The Rockefeller Foundation’s Rajiv Shah on How to Tackle the World’s Biggest Challenges
description: TIME spoke with Rajiv Shah about his new book 'Big Bets' and how to think more ambitiously about addressing the planet's problems.

title: How Peace and Prosperity in the Middle East Can Still Be Reached
description: Here’s how Israel, Saudi Arabia, and the Palestinians could still come together for a broader peace accord.
